title: Robert F. Kennedy Jr.
deleted: He is an anti-vaccine activist and conspiracy theorist and believes in the scientifically-debunked link between [[vaccines and autism]].<ref>{{Cite web| url = https://arstechnica.com/science/2019/07/anti-vaxxers-lose-again-ny-judge-upholds-ban-on-religious-exemptions |title =Prominent anti-vaxxers lose New York court case over religious exemptions|last=Mole|first=Beth |date= July 12, 2019| website= Ars Technica | access-date=November 15, 2019 | archive-url = https://web.archive.org/web/20191115030802/https://arstechnica.com/science/2019/07/anti-vaxxers-lose-again-ny-judge-upholds-ban-on-religious-exemptions |archive-date= November 15, 2019| url-status=live}}</ref><ref>{{Cite news|url = https://www.nytimes.com/2019/06/13/us/california-vaccine-bill.html |title = Here Is What Jessica Biel Opposes in California's Vaccine Bill | last = Hassan |first =Adeel|date= June 13, 2019|work=The New York Times |access-date= November 15, 2019| issn= 0362-4331|archive-url= https://web.archive.org/web/20191114205822/https://www.nytimes.com/2019/06/13/us/california-vaccine-bill.html|archive-date=November 14, 2019| url-status =live}}</ref>

title: Robert F. Kennedy Jr.
deleted: He is an anti-vaccine activist and conspiracy theorist and promotes the scientifically-debunked link between [[vaccines and autism]].<ref>{{Cite news|url = https://www.nytimes.com/2019/06/13/us/california-vaccine-bill.html |title = Here Is What Jessica Biel Opposes in California's Vaccine Bill | last = Hassan |first =Adeel|date= June 13, 2019|work=The New York Times |access-date= November 15, 2019| issn= 0362-4331|archive-url= https://web.archive.org/web/20191114205822/https://www.nytimes.com/2019/06/13/us/california-vaccine-bill.html|archive-date=November 14, 2019| url-status =live}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web| url = https://arstechnica.com/science/2019/07/anti-vaxxers-lose-again-ny-judge-upholds-ban-on-religious-exemptions |title =Prominent anti-vaxxers lose New York court case over religious exemptions|last=Mole|first=Beth |date= July 12, 2019| website= Ars Technica | access-date=November 15, 2019 | archive-url = https://web.archive.org/web/20191115030802/https://arstechnica.com/science/2019/07/anti-vaxxers-lose-again-ny-judge-upholds-ban-on-religious-exemptions |archive-date= November 15, 2019| url-status=live}}</ref> On 11 February 2021, his [[Instagram]] account was permanently deleted "for repeatedly sharing debunked claims" about the [[COVID-19 vaccine]]. <ref>{{Cite news|date=2021-02-11|title=Instagram bans Robert F Kennedy Jr over Covid vaccine posts|language=en-GB|work=BBC News|url=https://www.bbc.com/news/world-us-canada-56021904|access-date=2021-02-11}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web|date=2021-02-11|title=Instagram removes anti-vaxxer Robert F Kennedy Jr for false Covid-19 claims|url=http://www.theguardian.com/technology/2021/feb/10/instagram-removes-anti-vaxxer-robert-f-kennedy-jr|access-date=2021-02-11|website=the Guardian|language=en}}</ref>

title: Robert F. Kennedy Jr.
deleted: He is an anti-vaccine activist and conspiracy theorist and promotes the scientifically-debunked link between [[vaccines and autism]].<ref>{{Cite news|url = https://www.nytimes.com/2019/06/13/us/california-vaccine-bill.html |title = Here Is What Jessica Biel Opposes in California's Vaccine Bill | last = Hassan |first =Adeel|date= June 13, 2019|work=The New York Times |access-date= November 15, 2019| issn= 0362-4331|archive-url= https://web.archive.org/web/20191114205822/https://www.nytimes.com/2019/06/13/us/california-vaccine-bill.html|archive-date=November 14, 2019| url-status =live}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web| url = https://arstechnica.com/science/2019/07/anti-vaxxers-lose-again-ny-judge-upholds-ban-on-religious-exemptions |title =Prominent anti-vaxxers lose New York court case over religious exemptions|last=Mole|first=Beth |date= July 12, 2019| website= Ars Technica | access-date=November 15, 2019 | archive-url = https://web.archive.org/web/20191115030802/https://arstechnica.com/science/2019/07/anti-vaxxers-lose-again-ny-judge-upholds-ban-on-religious-exemptions |archive-date= November 15, 2019| url-status=live}}</ref> On 11 February 2021, his [[Instagram]] account was permanently deleted "for repeatedly sharing debunked claims" about [[COVID-19 vaccine]]s. <ref>{{Cite news|date=2021-02-11|title=Instagram bans Robert F Kennedy Jr over Covid vaccine posts|language=en-GB|work=BBC News|url=https://www.bbc.com/news/world-us-canada-56021904|access-date=2021-02-11}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web|date=2021-02-11|title=Instagram removes anti-vaxxer Robert F Kennedy Jr for false Covid-19 claims|url=http://www.theguardian.com/technology/2021/feb/10/instagram-removes-anti-vaxxer-robert-f-kennedy-jr|access-date=2021-02-11|website=the Guardian|language=en}}</ref>
